page.title: 01Introduction
page.content:
Our Domesday project work was based almost exclusively on field work covering our whole 12km block.Although about 8 field trips were undertaken we met very few people, on average one per expedition.
Therefore the information gathered for this section of the survey is based on that easily available to the school in Petham. Poor weather in the early part of the term made the time constraints tighter still and prevented the gathering of more detailed information especially from local people in the Upper and Lower Hardres areas.
